name: Punchable! [EARLY BETA]
description:
> Punchable! A Boxing Clicker Game! 

> NOTE: THIS GAME IS IN EARLY BETA! I WILL DEFINITELY BE WORKING ON IT MORE OFTEN!

> Press F to punch left or J to punch right! Press both at the same time to get more coins ;)

> See the "hits left" counter? Each time you get it to 0 it increases by 5! Also, every time you punch the dummy you get coins!

> Go to the "Menu" to buy different gloves (ONLY 3 AS OF RIGHT NOW) which do different damage to the dummy! (Ex. Green Glove has 3DPP or "Damage Per Punch" meaning you do 3 more damage to the dummy every time you hit it!)

> The better gloves you buy, the easier it is to defeat the dummy! There is also a code to get 300 coins (Just click see inside lol).

> Lastly, there is a World Record counter! It's not very useful in the BETA version right now but will be soon! Can you beat it?

> As always, follow me for more cool & intriguing games! This game took about 2 1/2 weeks to make (Plus breaks) so please consider giving it a reasonable rating and explain how I can improve on it!

> Also, don't forget to follow me on Scratch and these other platforms to stay up  to date on my games! 

Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/KrazyKernel/

GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@KrazyKernel

Newgrounds: https://krazykernel.newgrounds.com/
